description:
This goes in the "works like normal" bucket for those of us who work via multi-platform desktop environments. 

Though my home of choice, the 'nix world is has been getting some rock solid, first-rate desktop applications of the quality I've come to expect from those packaged for consumer OS's such as Windows and MacOS. 

This app fits into the rock-solid bucket. Plus, todoist offers an API and many integrations out-of-the-box. And you can squash the sidebar? There's little here not to like. An excellent app thus far.
summary: A stable and high-quality Linux desktop application

description: I like Todoist itself a lot. This app is no different from the website really, only in desktop app form. Stable and fast.
Hay que pagar para habilitar todas las propiedades :(
summary: No estan habilitadas todas las propuiedades

description: Great to do app but limited for free users than other apps

I didn't find the is problem but every start the app, after full close (log-out, restart system) me need to login again to account. Could you please fix this?
Fedora 34 Gnome / installed from "Software"
summary: Works fine, but need login again every start of application

description:
Wait a minute. There's a note in the description saying "This wrapper is not created by, affiliated with, or supported by Doist." yet Doist is listed as the developer?
Something is wrong here.
This is so good and so popular
summary: Very good app for utilizing task and very popular ......Thanks

description: Works very well and fill all my needs.
this is very clear and well designed and very detailed (in a good way) application. highly recommended

summary: Pleased to find a fully supported app for Linux

description: shiny app with todoist look and feel
La verdad es que funciona muy bien y es una excelente herramienta para el día a día
De primera necesidad para deja de procrastinar.
summary: Me gusto mucho y es muy util
